org.forgerock.openidm.cluster

Interface ClusterManagementService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClusterManager

    public interface ClusterManagementService
    An interface for the OpenIDM Cluster Management Service

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getInstanceId()
      Returns the node's instance ID
      boolean isEnabled()
      Returns true if clustering is enabled, false otherwise.
      boolean isStarted()
      Returns true if the cluster mangement thread has started, false otherwise.
      void register(String listenerId, ClusterEventListener listener)
      Registers a listener for notifications of cluster events
      void renewRecoveryLease(String instanceId)
      Renews the Cluster Management Service's recovery lease.
      void startClusterManagement()
      Starts the cluster management thread.
      void stopClusterManagement()
      Stops the cluster management thread.
      void unregister(String listenerId)
      Unregisters a listener

    • Method Detail

      • register

        void register(String listenerId,
            ClusterEventListener listener)
        Registers a listener for notifications of cluster events
        Parameters:
        listenerId - the listener's ID
        listener - the listener implementation

      • unregister

        void unregister(String listenerId)
        Unregisters a listener
        Parameters:
        listenerId - the listener's ID

      • renewRecoveryLease

        void renewRecoveryLease(String instanceId)
        Renews the Cluster Management Service's recovery lease. This should be used by listener's to prevent the recovery from timing out during the processing of an recovery event.
        Parameters:
        instanceId - the ID of the instance being recovered

      • startClusterManagement

        void startClusterManagement()
        Starts the cluster management thread.

      • stopClusterManagement

        void stopClusterManagement()
        Stops the cluster management thread.

      • isStarted

        boolean isStarted()
        Returns true if the cluster mangement thread has started, false otherwise.

      • isEnabled

        boolean isEnabled()
        Returns true if clustering is enabled, false otherwise.

      • getInstanceId

        String getInstanceId()
        Returns the node's instance ID
